meta.title: Solent Labs™
meta.description: We build software that makes complex systems observable. Open source at the core.

hero.headline: Tools that surface hidden data.
hero.subtitle: We build software that makes complex systems observable. Open source at the core.

approach.text: Complex systems hide their data. Devices bury metrics in clunky interfaces. APIs don't expose what you need. The information exists — it's just not accessible. We build bridges.

cableModemMonitor.name: Cable Modem Monitor
cableModemMonitor.description: DOCSIS signal monitoring for Home Assistant. Track signal strength, noise margins, and errors across all your modem's channels. 13 verified modems. 70% test coverage.

harCapture.name: HTTP Archive (HAR) Capture
harCapture.description: Zero-dependency Python library for sanitizing HAR files. Detects common PII patterns (passwords, tokens, emails) with format-preserving redaction. Interactive review mode for verification. Extensible for domain-specific patterns.

philosophy.title: How We Build
philosophy.intro: These principles guide every decision — and set expectations for contributors.

aiAccelerated.title: AI-accelerated:
aiAccelerated.text: We use AI as a force multiplier. Not as a gimmick, but as how a small team ships what used to take a large one. Every contributor benefits from the same tools.

systemsFirst.title: Systems-first:
systemsFirst.text: Understand the whole before optimizing parts. Monitoring isn't just numbers — it's understanding how metrics relate and what patterns predict failures.

rootCause.title: Root cause:
rootCause.text: Fix the system, not the symptom. When something breaks, trace it back. Every bug is a chance to improve the system.

dryArchitecture.title: DRY architecture:
dryArchitecture.text: Don't Repeat Yourself. One abstraction handles dozens of modems. Contributors extend patterns — they don't duplicate logic.

whySolent.title: Why "Solent"?
whySolent.nautical: The solent is the forestay cable on a cutter-rigged sailboat — the line that holds under pressure. Nautical heritage runs deep here.
whySolent.geographic: The Solent strait, between England and the Isle of Wight, is famous for currents that confound even experienced sailors. Our tools bring transparency to systems where complexity is invisible until something breaks.

community.title: Community
community.text: Built in the open. Contributions welcome.

meta.title: Cable Modem Monitor — Solent Labs™
meta.description: DOCSIS signal monitoring for Home Assistant. Track signal strength, noise margins, and errors.

header.title: Cable Modem Monitor
header.subtitle: Make your modem's signal data actionable.
header.subtitleSecondary: DOCSIS signal monitoring for Home Assistant.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.intro: Your cable modem tracks signal quality data — how strong your connection is, how clean the signal is, whether errors are accumulating. It's all buried in the modem's web interface. But that data isn't actionable.

items.noHistory: No history — you see a snapshot of right now, not what happened at 2am when your connection dropped
items.noAlerts: No alerts — the modem won't tell you when signal quality degrades or errors start climbing
items.noProof: No proof — when you call your ISP, "the internet is slow" isn't evidence they can act on
items.noCorrelation: No correlation — you can't connect "Zoom dropped at 3pm" with signal issues you weren't watching

solution.title: The Solution
solution.intro: Cable Modem Monitor pulls signal data directly from your modem and brings it into Home Assistant. Track connection health over time with historical graphs that catch the problems you'd otherwise miss.

captions.dashboard: Connection status, uptime, latency, and error counts at a glance
captions.downstream: Signal strength across all channels — spot imbalances instantly
captions.snr: Signal quality tracking helps identify issues before they cause drops
captions.latency: Response time monitoring catches slowdowns as they happen
captions.errors: Error trends reveal developing problems over days and weeks

proof.title: Proof when you need it
proof.text: Show your ISP actual data — signal quality dropping, error counts climbing. Evidence is harder to dismiss than "it feels slow."

patterns.title: Patterns over time
patterns.text: Catch the 2am drops and intermittent issues. Problems that vanish by the time you check are captured in the graphs.

oneIntegration.title: One integration, 13 modems
oneIntegration.text: Arris, Motorola, Netgear, Technicolor, Virgin Media — write once, support many. Each parser is tested against real device captures.

haAutomation.title: Home Assistant automation
haAutomation.text: Set alerts for signal degradation. Get notified before problems become outages.

install.title: Install
install.hacsNote: Search for "Cable Modem Monitor" in HACS integrations.

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.intro: Cable Modem Monitor grows through community contributions. Two ways to help:

captureData.title: Capture modem data
captureData.description: Share raw data from your modem to help us add support.

writeCode.title: Write a parser
writeCode.description: Build support for a new modem model.

items.parser: Create a parser following the pattern

meta.title: HAR-CAPTURE — Solent Labs™
meta.description: Zero-dependency Python library for sanitizing HAR files. Detect common PII patterns with interactive review. Extensible for custom patterns.

header.title: HTTP Archive (HAR) Capture
header.subtitle: Share HAR Files Safely
header.description: Sanitize HTTP Archive files for secure bug reports and diagnostics.

intro.text: Zero-dependency Python library that helps identify and remove common PII patterns from HAR files with format-preserving redaction. Use interactive review to verify what's flagged. Extensible for domain-specific patterns.

installation.title: Installation
installation.cliUsage:
# Capture and sanitize with interactive review
har-capture get https://example.com --interactive -o sanitized.har.gz

# Or sanitize existing file
har-capture sanitize input.har -o clean.har

# Interactive review mode
har-capture sanitize input.har --interactive
installation.apiUsage:
from har_capture import sanitize_har
import json

# Sanitize HAR data
with open('input.har') as f:
    har_data = json.load(f)

clean_har = sanitize_har(har_data)

with open('clean.har', 'w') as f:
    json.dump(clean_har, f)

demo.title: See It In Action
demo.placeholder: Interactive mode screenshots coming soon! The interactive review mode lets you see exactly what will be redacted before saving the sanitized file.
demo.mockServerNote: Want to try it yourself? Use the mock server to generate sample HAR files for testing.

items.deepPII: Common PII detection (passwords, tokens, emails, IPs, MACs)

items.support: Support teams collecting diagnostics from users

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.harSpec: Learn more about the HAR specification
